settings.page_subtitle: Have a question, comment, or brilliant idea you'd like to share? Send us a little note below - we love to hear from you and will always reply!

settings.title: MAY WE HELP YOU?
settings.page_subtitle:
In this section you can find answers
to the most frequently-asked questions
regarding the conditions of sale and our services
settings.content:
INDIASPOPUP truly hopes that you and your beloved ones are safe and in good health.
The Company is working to develop specific actions in line with local regulations, monitoring updates on COVID-19 provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and local government agencies.
For more information click here.

During these unprecedented times, we want to reassure you that we are taking all precautions and following necessary safety measures.

Contact us for any questions by calling our number 1.214.245.5324. We are available Monday through Friday from 9 am to 7 pm CST.

Curated by Archana Yenna. Indiaspopup.com is USA's premier online destination for luxury Indian designer fashion and jewelry that puts you in the middle of not just a local bazaar with flavors of regional fashions but brings together the most forward-thinking designers and boutiques from around the world.

If you’re anything like us, shopping is one of your favorite things to do. Fashion is not only fun, it's relaxing, creative and inspiring. Here you will find a curation of popular luxury clothing brands, emerging labels and beyond-the-label designer clothing all under one large, virtual roof. Our handpicked collection is selected with you in mind, ensuring you find the best pieces every time, no matter the occasion.

Need help putting together the perfect ensemble? We’ve got you covered! Simply visit our Popup Privileges section of the site to connect with one of our chic and savvy personal stylists. Our eyes seek refined beauty created by some of the most talented designers combining plush fabrics, intricate embroideries, thoughtful inspirations & quality craftsmanship.

Happy Shopping!

XOXO

settings.title: ABOUT US
settings.quote: “My focus has always been on curating only the best in fashion, alongside providing a luxury shopping environment both online and offline.”

settings.text: (30-60 MINUTES)
settings.title:
THE NEW SEASON
REFRESHER
settings.desc: As seasons change and temperatures shift, so does what's in style. We'll help you refresh your wardrobe with all the latest fashions of the season, including must-try pieces and upcoming trends that can't be missed.

settings.text: (30-60 MINUTES)
settings.title:
THE WARDROBE
REVAMP
settings.desc: If your closet is in need of a complete makeover, our Wardrobe Revamp is for you. Our stylests will transfrom your look, incorporating both timeless styles and trendy pieces into your freshly updated wardrobe.

settings.text: (30-60 MINUTES)
settings.title:
THE ESSENTIAL
ELEMENTS
settings.desc: Not sure how to choose jeans that are both flattering and functional? Need to pack your suitcase with just the right pieces for a destination getaway? Let us help stock your wardrobe with essentials for any occasion.

settings.text: (30-60 MINUTES)
settings.title:
THE PARTY
PREP
settings.desc: Elegant evening out? Best friendv's wedding? We know just what you need! Whether you're got a formal dinner or a cocktail party looming on your social horizon, our Party Prep service.

settings.text: (30-60 MINUTES)
settings.title:
THE FASHIONISTA
FRIENDS
settings.desc: Gather your friends for an afternoon of fashion-filled fun. Perfect for birthday bashes and sister shopping trips, this service allows your to spend quality time with your nearest and dearest.

settings.text: (30-60 MINUTES)
settings.title:
THE CUSTOM
CONSULT
settings.desc: Don't see quite what you're looking for? We've got you covered. Our Custom Consult is tailored to your specific wants and needs. Just fill us in on the details and we'll take it from there.

settings.title: Personal Shopping
settings.subtitle:
Whether you've got a special event coming up or are looking to stock your wardrobe with the
season's must-haves, our personal shopping services will give your style a fashion-forward boost.
settings.howwork_text:
STEP 1:  BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENT

From a total wardrobe makeover to a celebrity birthday shopping spree, select the services that best fit your needs.

STEP 2: GET IN TOUCH

Once you book your appointment, one of our stylists will contact you within 48 hours to learn more about your personal preferences, budget and overall wardrobe vision.

STEP 3: BUILD YOUR NEW LOOK

After chatting with your personal stylist about your fashion goals and desires, she will put together several outfit options, styled just for you. Our stylists are available for fashion assisstance anytime, ready to share our fashion know-how, offer honest advice and provide helpful suggestions.

settings.title:
1

FOR FIRST TIME USERS
settings.desc: To avoid delays to your order, please ensure that your billing address matches the address on your card statement, and that the cardholder's name is written as it appears on the card. Please also ensure that your contact details are filled in accurately so that we can contact you if necessary.

settings.title:
2

FOR REGISTERED USERS
settings.desc: If you are a returning customer and have an account, please sign in using your email address and password and you will be taken directly to the first ‘Checkout’ tab.

settings.title:
3

HOW TO MAKE A PURCHASE
settings.desc: Shopping the Indiaspopup.com Online Store is easy: if you know what you are looking for, use the specific category links, such as 'Clothing', 'Jewelry', ‘Accessories’, or the ‘Gift’ section on the site. Once you have found an item, select your size and quantity and use the 'ADD TO BAG' button. Review the items in your shopping bag by selecting the 'Shopping Bag' link at the top of the page. From the Shopping Bag you can directly edit product details (color, sizes and quantities), remove them in case you’ve changed your mind or add products to your Wish List. Click on 'Checkout' to complete your order.

settings.title: DO YOU SHIP TO MY COUNTRY?
settings.subtitle: We ship worldwide.

settings.title: HOW MUCH WILL I BE CHARGED FOR SHIPPING?
settings.subtitle: We offer Free Shipping on all orders. For international orders (Outside India), any customs charges need to be taken care of by the customer.

settings.title: WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY ORDER?
settings.subtitle: Delivery times vary by item, label and country. For delivery, we typically take 2 – 8 weeks from the time the order is placed. You can check the estimated delivery time on the specific item description page or in the order status in your account for items that you have ordered.

settings.title: CAN I REDIRECT AN ORDER AFTER I'VE ALREADY SUBMITTED THE ORDER?
settings.subtitle: If you would like to change your shipping address after you have placed your order, please request an address replacement by contacting us. It is not possible to change addresses once your order is already shipped.

settings.title: DO YOU DELIVER TO P.O. BOXES OR FREIGHT FORWARDING ADDRESSES?
settings.subtitle: At the moment we do not deliver to P.O. Boxes or freight forwarding addresses due to courier restrictions.

settings.title: IS MY PACKAGE INSURED?
settings.subtitle: All items are insured against theft and accidental damage whilst in transit from our warehouse to the shipping address. Once your items have been delivered to the specified delivery address and signed for, they are no longer covered by insurance. If your box is damaged upon arrival, we recommend that you either refuse the delivery, or make a note when signing for it that you are accepting a damaged box. (Please keep the external packaging material for our courier partners to inspect.) Please email us at info@indiaspopup.com

settings.title: WHAT IS YOUR RETURN POLICY?
settings.subtitle: At this time, Indiaspopup.com is unable to accept returns. Of course, if your item arrives damaged or incorrect, we will make every effort to remedy the situation. Please contact info@indiaspopup.com for more details.

settings.title: HOW DO I START THE RETURNS PROCESS?
settings.subtitle: Once your return is approved(damaged or incorrect items), You will receive an email with details on the return process with the shipping label.

settings.title: MY ITEM ARRIVED DAMAGED/ INCORRECT. WHAT DO I DO?
settings.subtitle: Our specially-trained Quality Assistance Team checks your items to make sure it's up to our standards before we dispatch it to you, so damage is rare. But if you're unhappy with the quality, or if we've sent you the wrong item, contact us within 24 hours of delivery, ideally sending us a couple of photos of the damage or other issues with the product. Our team will assess your complaint and arrange to collect the item from you and either give you a full refund, arrange for a repair, or order you a replacement.

settings.title: I RETURNED AN ITEM. WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY REFUND?
settings.subtitle: Once your return has been received and it complies with our returns policy, we will credit the refund amount on your Indiaspopup.com account with store credits. Under exceptional cases (for damaged merchandise or incorrect shipments) we will return the refund amount to the original method of payment used to place the order. Please be aware that, payments can take up to 14 working days (or more) to process depending on your bank or payment provider.
